caption.p: a) SAH bound to hRNTM (PDB 5E8J). 30 b) Docking of compound 21â€‰b in ZIKV NS5 MTase. The ethyl spacer on the carbazole nitrogen allows the phenyl ring to interact effectively with the hydrophobic pocket near the SAM binding site. The absence of the region in hRNMT is a potential determinant of target selectivity.
